title: CLA Public
description: Complete application for legal aid assistance

fields.question: What is your full name ?
fields.name: full_name
fields.hint: Enter your full legal name as it appears on official documents

fields.question: What is your date of birth?
fields.name: date_of_birth

fields.question: What is your email address?
fields.name: email_address
fields.hint: We'll use this to contact you about your application

fields.question: What is your home address?
fields.name: home_address
fields.hint: Include house number or name, street, town or city, and postcode

fields.question: How would you prefer us to contact you?
fields.name: preferred_contact
fields.hint: Choose your preferred method of communication

steps.title: Case Information
steps.description: Tell us about your legal matter

fields.question: What type of legal matter is this?
fields.name: case_type
fields.hint: Select the category that best describes your legal issue

fields.question: Briefly describe your legal issue
fields.name: case_description
fields.hint: Provide a brief summary of your legal matter (maximum 500 words)

fields.question: Is this matter urgent?
fields.name: urgency_level
fields.hint: Urgent matters may be prioritized for review

steps.title: Financial Information
steps.description: We need to assess your financial eligibility

fields.question: What is your monthly income?
fields.name: monthly_income
fields.hint: Include all sources of income before tax (Â£)

fields.question: Do you receive any benefits?
fields.name: benefits_received
fields.hint: Select all benefits you currently receive

fields.question: Do you have any savings or investments?
fields.name: has_savings
fields.hint: Include bank accounts, ISAs, shares, or other investments

fields.question: Which documents will you be able to provide?
fields.name: available_documents
fields.hint: Select all documents you can provide to support your application

fields.question: Are there any other documents relevant to your case?
fields.name: other_documents
fields.hint: Describe any other documents that may be relevant to your case

fields.question: I declare that the information I have provided is true and complete
fields.name: declaration_agreement
fields.hint: You must agree to this declaration to submit your application

fields.question: Any additional information
fields.name: additional_info
fields.hint: Provide any additional information that may be relevant to your application
